*** Settings ***
Resource          ../../UserKeywords/UserKeywords_DataSource.txt

*** Variables ***
${FilePath}       C:\\Python27\\Lib\\site-packages\\CodeLibWrapper\\RobotFrameworkSample\\SampleData\\Id.txt

*** Test Cases ***
DataSource_Test_ReadFlatFileByLines
    @{lines}    KW_DataSource_ReadFlatFile    ${FilePath}
    Log    ${lines}
    Comment    读取第二个Id
    Should Be Equal    @{Lines}[2]    0C000006TG

DataSource_Test_ReadFlagFile_RemoveHeader
    @{Lines}    KW_DataSource_ReadFlatFileRemoveHeader    ${FilePath}
    log    ${Lines}
    Comment    读取第二个Id
    log    @{Lines}[2]
    Should Be Equal    @{Lines}[2]    0C000006TP
